approved-dataset.question: Is the data from an approved dataset in [Trove](https://trove.apple.com/browse) or [DMS](https://confluence.corp.apple.com/display/plgAW/Dataset+legal+review+process)?

building-tools.question: Are you building tools for others to use?

critical-code.question: Is the code classified [Critical](https://genai.apple.com/policy/critical/)?
critical-code.detail: Critical code repositories have a file named `CRITICAL` at their root.

describe-tool-project.message: Tell us a bit about your project
describe-tool-project.detail: Please give us some detail about your current or planned tool project, including its goals and repository URL. This allows us to connect you with others working on similar goals.
describe-tool-project.placeholder: e.g. I am prototyping an internal tool for classifying Radars

privacy-sensitive.question: Is the data classified as [Privacy Sensitive](https://cloudtech.apple.com/documentation/getting-started/privacy-sensitive-data-types)?
privacy-sensitive.detail: Privacy Sensitive data includes data from study participants from health studies or who are children and Apple user data, including when the data has been aggregated or otherwise de-identified. For additional information review the [PSD policy](https://cloudtech.apple.com/documentation/getting-started/privacy-sensitive-data-types).

details.title: No Tier 0-1, PII, or Privacy Sensitive Data
Black/Ultra
details.message: You **are permitted** to use Black & Ultra code, but not [Critical](https://genai.apple.com/policy/critical/) code.

details.title: Proxy Required
details.message: You must access all models through the [Floodgate proxy](https://genai.apple.com/policy/floodgate/) which is available in supported internal tools.

details.title: Requests Are Logged
details.message: All messages and responses are logged securely and retained indefinitely.

tier01.question: Is the data [tier 0 or 1](https://infosec.apple.com/apply-security-requirements/governance-resources/data-classification-tiers.htm)?
tier01.detail: Tier 0 and 1 data includes financial & payment data, authentication data, and data relating to security flaws.

type-of-data-sent.question: What type of data is being sent in the prompt?

user-data.question: Did the data originate from users, even if non-personal?
user-data.detail: Non-personal user data includes aggregated and de-indentified data.
